definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (´[[י]] is noble, or is liberal, or hath impelled, cf. [[נְדַבְיׇה]])—
´[[יְהוֹ]] son of Rechab & chief of the Rechabites (LXX )Iwanadab) 2Ki 10:15, 2Ki 10:15, 2Ki 10:23, Je 35:8, Je 35:14, Je 35:16, Je 35:18; = ´[[יוֹ]] Je 35:6, Je 35:10, Je 35:19.
´[[יְהוֹ]] nephew of David (LXX )Iwnadab, )Iwnadam; LXXL )Iwanaqan) 2Sa 13:5; = ´[[יוֹ]] 2Sa 13:3, 2Sa 13:3, 2Sa 13:32, 2Sa 13:35; (appar. called Jonathan 2Sa 21:21, 1Ch 20:7, cf. [[יְהוֹנׇתָן]]
